text: "New Year's Day" is a 1983 song by Irish rock band U2. It is the third track from their third studio album War. It went to number 2 in Ireland, number 9 in the Netherlands and Norway and number 10 in the United Kingdom. ==Formats and track listings== == References == Category:1983 songs Category:U2 songs
title: New Year's Day (U2 song)
